title: What Happened To The Truckers Yesterday Was Disgraceful (Ep 1727)
description:
What they did to the truckers in DC yesterday was a disgrace! In this episode, I address the scandal. I also discuss an Axios piece about a concerning “mass migration” and the latest developments out of Ukraine. 

News Picks:


Is there a “mass migration” of illegal immigrants coming in the spring? 

All of a sudden, Politico wants a re-evaluation of cancel culture?


Teacher’s Union representative

Is the world going to end in 2060?

Hundreds of losers from Yale law school protest a free speech event. 


An explanation of our obligations under NATO.
